# Before (v1.x.x):

## ğŸ“¢ Stay Updated

- **Watch this repo** â†’ Custom â†’ âœ“ Releases to get notified of new versions
- **Breaking changes** are announced in [Discussions â†’ Announcements](https://github.com/aborruso/csvnorm/discussions/categories/announcements)
- **Semantic Versioning**: `MAJOR.MINOR.PATCH`
  - `MAJOR`: Breaking changes (e.g., 1.x.x â†’ 2.0.0)
  - `MINOR`: New features, backward compatible (e.g., 1.0.x â†’ 1.1.0)
  - `PATCH`: Bug fixes (e.g., 1.0.0 â†’ 1.0.1)
